weekly_top_story.headline: Moderna Announces Promising Data on mRNA Therapeutics for Rare Metabolic Diseases at 2025 International Congress
weekly_top_story.summary: Moderna presented new Phase 1/2 and dose-escalation study data demonstrating progress in mRNA therapies targeting rare metabolic conditions like methylmalonic and propionic acidemia, highlighting potential for novel treatment options for inborn errors of metabolism.

stories.headline: Promise Healthcare Opens Fifth Clinic in Champaign Offering Integrated Medical and Behavioral Health Services
stories.summary: Promise Healthcare launched its new Kenyon clinic, expanding patient access to coordinated medical and behavioral health care in Champaign County, improving local community health service availability.

stories.headline: Congress Faces Critical Health Funding Decisions as September 30 Government Shutdown Deadline Looms
stories.summary: Congress returned to negotiate FY 2026 health funding bills including the FDA budget, amid partisan tensions risking a government shutdown that could impact healthcare sector operations and research funding.
